examples.example: 无论遇到多少困难，他还是保持着乐观的心态。

translate.english: No matter how many difficulties he encounters, he still maintains an optimistic attitude.

examples.example: 尽管已经取得了很大的成就，他还是不断努力提升自己。

translate.english: Although he has already made great achievements, he still keeps working hard to improve himself.

examples.example: 不管别人怎么说，我还是会坚持自己的梦想。

translate.english: No matter what others say, I will still stick to my own dream.
